Title: You Only Live Once
Actors: Sylvia Sidney, Henry Fonda, Barton MacLane, Jean Dixon
Plot: Joan is the secretary to the public defender in a large city. She is in love with a career criminal named Eddie, and she believes that he is a basically good person who just had some tough breaks. She uses her influence to get him released early, and he tries to go straight after marrying her, but things don't work out, and they both go on the lam.
